entry.title: $2149 // 2BR in Crown Heights. Great Price, NO FEE!
entry.content:
Beautiful true 2BR in the Heart of Crown Heights, for a great price! NO FEE!


• Heat and H/W included
• roof access
• stainless steel appliances with microwave
• hardwood floors

Fantastic location, near some of the best restaurants in Brooklyn. Close to Prospect Park, and the 2,3,4,5 and A trains, making it an easy commute to anywhere in Manhattan or Brooklyn!

Contact Tim asap for a private showing. show contact info





*1BR, 2BR, 3BR, Studio, No Fee, Stainless Steel, Dishwasher, Laundry, W/D, W/D in unit, gym, balcony, rooftop, terrace, lounge, king, queen, closet, closets, hardwood, high ceiling, parking, park, garage, Brooklyn, Williamsburg, Bushwick, Crown Heights, Bed Stuy, Clinton Hill, Prospect Park, Prospect Heights, Lefferts Gardens, Park Slope, South Slope, Greenwood, Sunset Park, Kensington, Ditmas Park, Fort Greene, bknofee
